description:
What is the one thing that all highly profitable online businesses have in common?

YES – they all have a responsive list of subscribers and customers!

The lifeblood of your online business lies in having a responsive mailing list.

Without a list, you are limiting the income and growth potential of your business. It's like building your house on weak foundation, literally.

Do you want to have a business that is profitable and sustainable in the long run? 

Then building a list has got to be your top priority!

Would you love to have hundreds or even thousands of responsive subscribers that are eager to hear from you and buy the products you recommend?

Then this course is here to show you the way!


*************************************************************

ONE-TIME ENROLLMENT FOR LIFETIME LEARNING!

I will regularly update this course with fresh content to bring you the most up-to-date knowledge and tips.

Once you are enrolled as a student, you will receive all future updates and new content additions automatically at no extra cost.

Yes! You get lifetime updates – and it's free. That's lots of real money saved!

*************************************************************


This course will give you a rock-solid foundation on the 'whats' and 'hows' to build your first mailing list from scratch.

Even if you do not have any experience with list building right now, you will be confident of the steps to take after taking this course! 

In this structured course, you will be guided through a viable and easy-to-follow system to attract subscribers to your list, and nurture them into paying customers for your online business!

The best part is, you will also gain the skills to make real money from your own mailing list!


Here are the knowledge and skills that you will take away from this practical course:

  • Appreciate why starting an online business without a list is a waste of time!
  • What are the important things you should know before you build your list!
  • What are the 3 key elements you must have in every responsive mailing list
  • How to use a lead magnet to attract subscribers to join your list!
  • How to leverage other peoples' products as your lead magnet without having to create your own!
  • Three-week action plan to build your first list of subscribers
  • Form meaningful joint ventures by joining my closed community
  • Know where to get different kinds of affiliate products to promote to your list!
  • Learn to create a product that people want to buy with the power of your list!
  • How to monetize your list and make extra income online!


To help you get the most out of this course, all the strategies and concepts covered are clearly explained in simple terms and mapped out in actionable steps that make it easy for you to understand and follow.

This course comes with over 20 concise lessons that walk you through each and every step as well as action plans that help you to effectively apply what you learn!

Above all, if you get stuck or experience any difficulties along the way, you won't ever have to struggle on your own and worry about having no one to turn to for help.

Upon becoming a student of this course, you will receive continuous support from me – help that comes with no expiry! I will be here to share my advice and answers to all your questions whenever you need help from me!

I trust that 'How To Make Your First Dollar Online By Building A List' will give you the confidence and skills you need to build your first responsive mailing list and lay a solid foundation for your online business forward!


**********************************************************************

30-DAY COOLING-OFF PERIOD

I trust that you'll like this course as much as I enjoyed teaching it!

But if the course is not to your satisfaction, you have the option to cancel if within the first 30 days and receive a full refund of your money. No questions, no hassles!

**********************************************************************


So what foundation do you choose to build your business on? I believe you fully deserve to learn everything that I teach in this course. 

This is a gift that only YOU can give yourself, so act on it and I welcome you to join my course!

Click the 'Take This Course' button on top and I'll see you on the other side!
title: How To Make Your First Dollar By Building A List
